column3: Setup: Use the todo_associate testdrive to setup for this test, of follow the next steps
Setup: You should set up a user account which has only the associate editor role

Setup: The user account should be assigned at least 4 applications which meet the following criteria: one that was created over 6 weeks ago, one that has not been modified for 3 weeks, one which has recently been assigned to the user and is in the pending state, and one recent application
log in as an associate editor

Go to the editor's dashboard page

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//editor

column4: You can see 4 applications in your priority list
The highest priority application is for an old application
The second priority is for a stalled application
The third priority is for a recently assigned/pending application
The lowest priority is for an open application

column3: click on the highest priority application

column4: The application opens in a new browser tab/window

column3: Edit the application in some minor way and save
close the tab, return to the dashboard and reload the page
Click on the highest priority application again
Change the application status to "Completed" and save
close the tab, return to the dashboard and reload the page

column4: You can see 3 applications in your priority list
The application you have just edited as disappeared from your priority list

column3: click on the new highest priority application (stalled)
Edit the application in some minor way and save
close the tab, return to the dashboard and reload the page

column4: You can still see 3 applications in your priority list
The stalled application you modified in the previous steps is no longer your highest priority, it is now listed only as an "open application"
Your new highest priority is a pending application

column3: click on the new highest priority application (pending)
Change the application status to "In Progress" and save
close the tab, return to the dashboard and reload the page

column4: You can still see 3 applications in your priority list
All your applications are now "open applications"
They are ordered by created date, with the oldest first
